name: OR_CASE_BILL_SPEC_NEED
description: This table contains information on billing special needs.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CASE_BILL_SPEC_C_NAME
columns.description: This item contains a list of potential special considerations for billing.
